backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, places, routes, emergency data, SOS snapshots, meetup locations, and access-controlled CRUD operations using storage and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, associated files, components, and test IDs for map zoom preference and shared URL utilities.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend files covering hooks, components, utilities, and pages.
Manual smoke‑test checklist describing steps and expected results for flyer download and share functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, light/dark mode tokens, and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes, global layout, theme provider, and profile setup dialog for the frontend app.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI screen showing an access‑denied message with navigation back to the home page.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Route guard that checks caller admin role and displays loading or access‑denied UI before rendering protected content.
frontend/src/components/auth/Authenticat: Guards routes by checking Internet Identity; shows login card if unauthenticated or renders children otherwise.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Renders login/logout button that handles Internet Identity auth flow and clears cached queries on logout.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with header, optional sidebar/mobile nav for authenticated users, content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppNav.ts: Sidebar navigation listing app routes and conditionally showing admin and emergency lookup links based on user role.
frontend/src/components/layout/BrandHead: Top header with branding, share button, emergency lookup access, and login controls.
frontend/src/components/maps/MapZoomCont: Control for selecting preferred map zoom level and storing it in user preferences.
frontend/src/components/profile/Emergenc: Manages generating, viewing, copying, and rotating an emergency access code tied to the user's principal.
Form for saving emergency profile details using a stored access code, with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Shows a dialog for new authenticated users to enter their name and create a profile.
frontend/src/components/profile/Verifica: Lets users upload and track progress of license and ID verification files, showing current verification status.
frontend/src/components/share/FlyerPrevi: Displays a printable flyer preview promoting the platform and showing a shareable URL.
frontend/src/components/share/ShareDialo: Provides a dialog to copy, share, or view/download a flyer containing the generated app share link.
frontend/src/components/sos/LastKnownLoc: Shows the SOS snapshot’s timestamp and coordinates with a link to view the location on Google Maps.
frontend/src/components/sos/PublicSOSCar: Displays emergency contacts, optional driver details, and last known SOS location for first responders.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQrCodeCanvas.ts: React hook that generates QR codes onto a canvas with abort handling, timeout protection, and ready/error state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend actor methods, including user profile, role, admin actions, and verification workflows.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining light/dark theme variables and custom component styles for the UI.
frontend/src/lib/accessCode.ts: Generates, stores, retrieves, and clears a 12‑character access code in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/clipboard.ts: Implements a resilient clipboard copy function with secure-context checks and a DOM fallback method.
frontend/src/lib/domToPng.ts: Empty placeholder file for DOM‑to‑PNG functionality.
frontend/src/lib/fileValidation.ts: Validates file size and type for uploads and provides a helper to format file sizes.
frontend/src/lib/flyerExport.ts: Renders a flyer DOM element into a high‑resolution PNG using manual canvas drawing for compatibility.
frontend/src/lib/geolocation.ts: Wraps browser geolocation API to return current coordinates with error handling and timeouts.
frontend/src/lib/googleMapsUrl.ts: Builds Google Maps URLs from latitude/longitude with optional zoom parameters.
frontend/src/lib/mapZoomPreference.ts: Manages storing, retrieving, and clamping map zoom levels in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/meetupShareCode.ts: Generates an 8‑character meetup share code and provides localStorage persistence utilities.
frontend/src/lib/placeCategory.ts: Maps place category enums to labels and builds select options, with a helper to get labels.
frontend/src/lib/principal.ts: Validates and safely parses Dfinity Principal IDs from text.
frontend/src/lib/qr.ts: Empty placeholder module for QR-related utilities.
frontend/src/lib/qrCodeGenerator.ts: Implements a QR code generator with Reed‑Solomon error correction and module pattern rendering.
frontend/src/lib/qrDownload.ts: Provides a function to download a canvas element as a PNG with basic validation.
frontend/src/lib/quickShare.ts: Implements Web Share API handling with clipboard fallback and structured status results.
frontend/src/lib/shareUrl.ts: Returns the canonical base URL for sharing using window.location.origin.
frontend/src/lib/time.ts: Converts between Date and bigint microsecond timestamps and formats dates.
frontend/src/lib/urlParams.ts: Adds utilities to get and remove URL parameters supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entry point that sets up React, QueryClient, and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AddPlacePage.tsx: Form page allowing authenticated users to add a place with category, location, and description.
frontend/src/pages/AddRoutePage.tsx: Form page for creating a route with start, destination, waypoints, date/time, and notes.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard with tabs for registrations, verification review, and SOS locations, using multiple query hooks and action handlers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminReviewPage.tsx: Empty page file with no implementation.
frontend/src/pages/EmergencyLookupPage.t: Emergency lookup interface where responders enter a principal ID and access code to view SOS or emergency profile data.
frontend/src/pages/FlyerPage.tsx: Page to preview, copy, and export a shareable flyer, including optional auto-export behavior.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Public landing page showing app features and redirecting authenticated users to Places.
frontend/src/pages/MeetupPage.tsx: Lets users share and look up live meetup locations with periodic updates, codes, and map tools.
frontend/src/pages/PlaceDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed information about a selected place from search results, including category, description, and submitter.
frontend/src/pages/PlacesListPage.tsx: Lists safe places with category filtering, text search, and navigation to add a new place. Displays loading, empty state, and filtered results.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows the user's profile with loading state and includes verification, emergency access code, and emergency profile cards. Uses auth guard to restrict access.
frontend/src/pages/RouteDetailPage.tsx: Placeholder page showing a simple route detail view with a back button.
frontend/src/pages/RoutesListPage.tsx: Displays the user's routes and allows searching routes by principal ID, with loading, empty states, and navigation to add a route.
frontend/src/pages/SOSCardPage.tsx: Fetches and displays the user's emergency SOS card or prompts setup if none exists, with navigation back to the SOS page.
frontend/src/pages/SOSPage.tsx: Allows users to capture a one-time SOS location snapshot and navigate to view their SOS card. Includes warnings, loading states, and error handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash-based and standard query routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and container settings while loading typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing features, known issues, and pending requests for a project using versioned schema tracking.
